üîó API Endpoints

Main Google Sports API

GET /.netlify/functions/google-sports-api

Query Parameters:

  • query - Search term (e.g., "Cardinals game", "NFL scores")
  • sport - Sport filter (nfl, mlb, nba, ncaa, soccer)
  • team - Specific team name
  • league - League name for standings

Example API Calls:

// Get NFL scores GET /.netlify/functions/google-sports-api?sport=nfl // Search for specific team GET /.netlify/functions/google-sports-api?query=Cardinals&sport=mlb // Get college football data GET /.netlify/functions/google-sports-api?sport=ncaa&team=longhorns // General sports search GET /.netlify/functions/google-sports-api?query=basketball scores today

üõ†Ô∏è Integration Guide

Include the JavaScript Integration

<script src="/js/google-sports-integration.js"></script>

Add the Container HTML

<div id="google-sports-container"></div>

Initialize the Widget (Optional)

// Auto-initializes if container exists, or manual init: const sportsWidget = new GoogleSportsIntegration('google-sports-container');

Customize and Configure

The widget includes built-in search, sport filters, auto-updates every 5 minutes, and responsive design.

‚ö†Ô∏è API Key Required

For production use, you'll need a SerpApi key. Set the SERPAPI_API_KEY environment variable in your Netlify dashboard. The integration includes fallback data for demo purposes.

üöÄ Advanced Features

Blaze Intelligence Enhancements

  • Predictive Analytics: AI-powered game predictions with confidence scores
  • Championship Probabilities: Season-long championship likelihood calculations
  • Pressure Metrics: Game context and stakes analysis
  • Blaze Score: Proprietary data quality and freshness rating

Performance Optimizations

  • Intelligent Caching: 5-minute cache for optimal performance
  • Auto-Updates: Widget refreshes every 5 minutes automatically
  • Fallback Data: Graceful degradation when API is unavailable
  • Responsive Design: Mobile-first responsive interface

üìù Implementation Notes

Environment Variables

# Required for production (Netlify Dashboard ‚Üí Site Settings ‚Üí Environment Variables) SERPAPI_API_KEY=your_serpapi_key_here # Optional: Additional sports data APIs SPORTSDATAIO_API_KEY=your_sportsdataio_key

Error Handling

The integration includes comprehensive error handling:

  • API Failures: Automatic fallback to cached/simulated data
  • Network Issues: Retry mechanisms with exponential backoff
  • Rate Limiting: Built-in request throttling and caching
  • Graceful Degradation: Core functionality maintained even without API
üîß Technical Requirements

Modern browser with ES6+ support, Fetch API, and CSS Grid. The widget is fully responsive and works on all devices.
